titles.title: The life of Jesus Christ in you will rise again

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The life of Christ in you will rise again.
The life of Christ in you will rise again.
Though the floods may try to drown it
And the fires of hell surround it,
Though that life be buried in the tomb,
It can't stay down.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It will rise again.
It will rise again.
Surely as the sun, it will rise.
It will rise again.
It will rise again.
Higher than the stars in sky.
It can't stay down.
